sect2.title: FormatSwitch-Action
sect2.para: The FormatSwitch-Action allows formatting switch-statemens, where spaces are put, where newlines are put, etc.

para.literallayout: The option spaceAfterSwitch specifies if there is a space after the T_SWITCH token The option spaceAfterSwitchVariable specifies if there is a space after the closing brace around the variable The option breakBeforeCurlyBrace specifies if there is a break before the curly brace.
